column5: Found this in an OLLLLLD TIME Magazine (Nov 23, 1959 to be exact) which I bought off ebay to prepare for my wife's upcoming 50th birthday ... anyhow I figured you would get a kick out of it ... let me know if you want the higher-res version I can email it to you   Back then it seems it was actually cheaper to fly than to drive ...ahh the good old days
when he returns from his fishing trip in a week you can bump it back up to the top so he can see it
good plan .. thanks Terry .. didnt realize he was away
I still think Waynes rates are the same as that ad

ohenry ... first off .. it's you're not your ... and that shot of Bob's niece on your sig is just plain WRONG... I have a daughter about that age and I can assure you I much as I tend to agree (she is) .... it is JUST WRONG ...

if it's so wrong why is it on wfn.tv ?  she's obviously promotional eye candy and it doesnt appear to bother her.  keep your morality to yourself and don't click on the link.  btw, thanks for pointing it out otherwise, i would've missed it.
I would have missed it too.
Actually ohhenrygsr there's too much going on in your signature line, something has got to go.....?
Dang..... how did I miss that
Hell, I had to log on to see what the fuss was....  Jumpin,,,,What a fuss ......Copy Paste.....Thanks!
Well boys .. as I keep reminding my wife .. I may be a lot of things ... but inattentive isnt one of them
inattentive?  Most women I have ever known would look twice....maybe three times............. and smile back.

Thanks Jon... for the airplane and the other links! LOL Agree pretty sad to use your own daughter for marketing $'s... but like my wife always tells me.. I can look all I want ! LOL  And Yes I can still fly to the lake for less money than it costs to drive.
